info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: Gets the specified private link service by resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting PrivateLinkService resource.

put.description: Creates or updates an private link service in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update private link service operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting privateLinkService resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting privateLinkService resource.

delete.description: Deletes the specified private link service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets all private link services in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of privateLinkService resources.

get.description: Gets all private link service in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of PrivateLinkService resources.

get.description: Get the specific private end point connection by specific private link service in the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

parameters.name: peConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private end point connection.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting private end point connection resource.

put.description: Approve or reject private end point connection for a private link service in a subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

parameters.name: peConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private end point connection.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to approve or reject the private end point connection.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting PrivateEndpointConnection resource.

delete.description: Delete private end point connection for a private link service in a subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

parameters.name: peConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the private end point connection.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets all private end point connections for a specific private link service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the private link service.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of private end point connection resources.

post.description: Checks whether the subscription is visible to private link service.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the domain name.

requestBody.description: The request body of CheckPrivateLinkService API call.

200.description: Request successful. Returns whether the subscription is visible to private link service.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Checks whether the subscription is visible to private link service in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the domain name.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

requestBody.description: The request body of CheckPrivateLinkService API call.

200.description: Request successful. Returns whether the subscription is visible to private link service.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns all of the private link service ids that can be linked to a Private Endpoint with auto approved in this subscription in this region.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the domain name.

200.description: Request successful. Returns all of the private link service ids that can be linked to a Private Endpoint with auto approved in this subscription in this region.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns all of the private link service ids that can be linked to a Private Endpoint with auto approved in this subscription in this region.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the domain name.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. Returns all of the private link service ids that can be linked to a Private Endpoint with auto approved in this subscription in this region.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: Properties of the private link service.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

loadBalancerFrontendIpConfigurations.description: An array of references to the load balancer IP configurations.

ipConfigurations.description: An array of private link service IP configurations.

networkInterfaces.description: An array of references to the network interfaces created for this private link service.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private link service resource.

privateEndpointConnections.description: An array of list about connections to the private endpoint.

visibility.description: The visibility list of the private link service.

autoApproval.description: The auto-approval list of the private link service.

alias.description: The alias of the private link service.

enableProxyProtocol.description: Whether the private link service is enabled for proxy protocol or not.

PrivateLinkServiceProperties.description: Properties of the private link service.

ResourceSet.description: The base resource set for visibility and auto-approval.

properties.description: Properties of the private link service ip configuration.

name.description: The name of private link service ip configuration.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

PrivateLinkServiceIpConfiguration.description: The private link service ip configuration.

privateIPAddress.description: The private IP address of the IP configuration.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: The private IP address allocation method.

subnet.description: The reference to the subnet resource.

primary.description: Whether the ip configuration is primary or not.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private link service IP configuration resource.

privateIPAddressVersion.description: Whether the specific IP configuration is IPv4 or IPv6. Default is IPv4.

PrivateLinkServiceIpConfigurationPropert.description: Properties of private link service IP configuration.

properties.description: Properties of the private end point connection.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

privateEndpoint.description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

value.description: A list of PrivateLinkService resources in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

PrivateLinkServiceListResult.description: Response for the ListPrivateLinkService API service call.

value.description: A list of PrivateEndpointConnection resources for a specific private link service.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: Response for the ListPrivateEndpointConnection API service call.

privateLinkServiceAlias.description: The alias of the private link service.

CheckPrivateLinkServiceVisibilityRequest.description: Request body of the CheckPrivateLinkServiceVisibility API service call.

PrivateLinkServiceVisibility.description: Response for the CheckPrivateLinkServiceVisibility API service call.

value.description: An array of auto approved private link service.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

AutoApprovedPrivateLinkServicesResult.description: An array of private link service id that can be linked to a private end point with auto approved.

privateLinkService.description: The id of the private link service resource.
